Hi.

I am Antonio Páez.

I am an Engineer and Geographer. I have been a professor of geography at [McMaster University](https://experts.mcmaster.ca/display/paezha) since 2002. I have long-standing interests in math, society, art, politics, computer languages, and poetry.

Not sure what this blog will look like yet, but likely will be a combination of musing, arts, writing, and occasional professional news.
